name: Junior Monster Story - Free Cartoon Movie Maker
name_original: Junior Monster Story - Free Cartoon Movie Maker
description:
Create your own animated monster movie! It’s playful, creative and educational movie making app for your kid’s aged 3 and up

Halloween is just around the corner and we have the spookiest apps of all. Meet Zoi, Burr, Lui, Cojo, Jello, Mendi, Timba, Bobo, Azkar and Flopsy. They are the cutest and amazing monsters ever. Enjoy your Halloween; help your kids create their own animated movie with these amazing monsters. Move them around, record sounds for them, build different themes for all your animated movies and share it with friends. Each monster has a unique sound. This app features:

√ Choose monsters to build your animated movie
√ You can select 4 monsters at max out of 10
√ More than 10 backgrounds to choose from
√ 50+ props available to add up to your theme
√ Move them around and record voices for each of them
√ There is a unique voice for each of the monsters
√ Attractive, Colorful and Amazing HD animations
√ Share it with your family and friends

Movie making is a magic that inspires every creative mind. But it’s not so difficult anymore. Every kid can create a unique animated monster movie himself. You may help your kids to do so.
